metadata.title: CVE-2024-23848 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel through 6.7.1, there is a use-after-free incec_queue_msg_fh, related to drivers/media/cec/core/cec-adap.c anddrivers/media/cec/core/cec-api.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-23848` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1004.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
